properties.description: Attractive three bedroom semi-detached family home situated within 0.5 miles of Petts Wood station with fast trains to London and within easy walking distance of local shops, schools, bus routes and National Trust woodland. The property comprises; two receptions, fitted 18'9 x 10'1 kitchen/breakfast room and conservatory. The property also benefits from having a utility room and cloakroom. To the first floor there are three bedrooms and a family bathroom with separate WC. Additional features include double glazing, gas central heating and a well presented interior
properties.location: Petts Wood Road, Petts Wood, Orpington BR5
properties.title: Modern House in Petts Wood BR5
properties.shortDescription: Explore this beautiful 3-bedroom house nestled in a peaceful neighborhood, featuring a spacious garden perfect for relaxation and outdoor activities.

properties.description: Presented in excellent decorative order throughout is this two double bedroom, two bathroom, garden flat.        The modern fitted kitchen is open plan to the living room which boasts solid wooden floors and includes integrated appliances including a dishwasher & a washing machine. This large open plan benefits from bi folding doors onto a secluded private courtyard garden. Both bedrooms are double sized, and the family bathroom boasts a matching three piece suite a shower attachment over the bath. There is also a separate wet room. There are walnut doors throughout and wiring for Sky TV/aerial points in the living room/kitchen and both bedrooms.This apartment being only five years old, is still under a 10 year building guarantee...
properties.title: Newleeds Road, Kettlewell, Skipton, North Yorkshire, BD23
properties.shortDescription: Experience luxury living in this modern 2-bedroom apartment, complete with a stylish balcony that offers breathtaking views of the surrounding mountains

properties.description: This exceptionally well-presented apartment has been finished to the highest of standards. Boasting unmatched lateral living across three separate floors, The Orchid Suite is sure to appeal to a range of parties searching for premium city centre living. The property is entered via the 45th floor, and you are immediately greeted to a stunning curved entrance reception area, leading through to a sizeable open plan reception, and kitchen/dining room. Situated on this floor also is a utility room, and WC.
properties.title: Newleeds Road, Kettlewell, Skipton, North Yorkshire, BD23
properties.shortDescription: Long a staple of Manchester City Centre skyline, Beetham Tower has continuously been recognized as one of Manchester's most iconic developments.

properties.description: This beautiful apartment has an entrance hall leading to the superb open plan living space which has two tall windows from which to enjoy the wonderful view of York Minster. The kitchen is fitted with a range of stylish units complemented by luxury granite worktops incorporating a gas hob, extractor hood, double oven/grill, integrated fridge/freezer and a dishwasher. There is plenty of space for a dining table and chairs, and the lounge area has a wonderful cosy feel with a gas fire in a feature surround.
properties.title: The Purey Cust, New York, YO1
properties.shortDescription: Elegant 2 double-bedroom first-floor apartment, perfectly situated in the heart of the city center, offering convenient access to shops, restaurants, and more

properties.description: This impressive family home is designed for modern living with a spacious lounge, and a dining room with access to the back garden. The hub of the home is a generous open-plan kitchen with breakfast and family areas also leading to the garden via French doors. A utility room adjacent to the kitchen has convenient access to the integral double garage. An elegant main bedroom with Juliet balcony and full en suite is upstairs, along with three further double bedrooms and a family bathroom with separate shower
properties.title: Croftlands Gardens, Bolton-le-Sands BR5
properties.shortDescription: Charming home in Croftlands Gardens, Bolton-le-Sands, offering cozy living with beautiful surroundings.

properties.description: Located in one of the UK's fastest-growing neighborhoods, this exclusive off-market development is currently in construction and will be extremely sought after in the residential rental market /n Enquire today to register your interest in a luxury residential development in the Ancoats district in the heart of Manchester city center.
